I replaced my fish oil with Krill Oil.  It does cause gas, but the main thing that was distressing was the
nauseating smell of rotten fish.  I tried 1 whole bottle and tried to take the second, but the gagging was hard to put up with.  I wrote to Native Path about it and they replied that the smell was normal.  I wonder why that is not mentioned in the ads for Krill Oil?  I have never read of that "side effect".  I am throwing the unused bottles away as it is just not worth the reaction I have t,o the smell.  Expensive lesson.

details: Blessed |  Age: 65-74 |   On supplement for 1 to 6 months |
scores: Condition: Cardiovascular disease (CVD) , Overall rating 4.7 ,Effectiveness,Ease of Use,Satisfaction,Report this post
reviews: My wife has profound heart disease.  95 percent blockages in several arteries. She is inoperable due to decades of untreated diabetes. Unfortunately,eight years ago she had a stroke and heart attack that really beat her down. Then ,due to us using sucralose sweetener (spenda) in all her beverages her stomach stopped digesting water. Then her HMO treated her dehydration by messing up her heart medicine ,which blinded her by making her cataracts eighty percent worse in three weeks and giving her a, dose of reglan that blew her brain to pieces.  Thankfully, I found the sucralose problem we stopped using it- it still took two months for her stomach to heal to accept plain water and we had to wait five months for the cataract surgery.  That cataract surgery saved her life. Still most of the heart blood medicines they gave her really effected her brain. This all happened over the last four years. We had some krill oil in the fridge and she was really heading into a bad place so I said lets try this.  The krill oil is simply a miracle. Her brain is coming back to life. Her sores on the front of her legs is getting much smaller. She still suffers greatly but the trend is heading in a positive direction. She takes a very large dose. Three 800 mg in the morning and three 800 mg at night. There is no stomach discomfort and the krill oil is miles more effective then fish oil. She's on lasix for water retention,krill oil which is saving her life and quality of life as well as magnesium picolenate.zinc picolinate,b vitamin supplements and cranberry pills( vitamin c) to fight urinary tract infections.  We are in the fight now. She's also maintains her diabetes will the proper shots too. Buy a quality krill oil and be sure its krill oil. Some of these slimy companies package fish oil in the exact same package.  Good luck to you and thanks to God for the miracle of real krill oil.

details: Slg |  Age: 35-44 |   On supplement for 1 to 6 months |
scores: Condition: Other , Overall rating 5.0 ,Effectiveness,Ease of Use,Satisfaction,Report this post
reviews: I went to the vitamin store looking for a joint supplement to help with my psoriatic arthritis which left me in so much pain. The sales staff recommended Krill Plus, 1085 mg of omega 3. I take you gels in the morning.  I have only taken  it for a month but the results are amazing.  I had no pain head to toe. All the inflammation from my psoriasis and the arthritis went away, it even started clearing the psoriasis on my legs that had spread 3 years ago.   As an added bonus, my acid reflux went aw,ay and my heart palpitations stopped.   I also dropped one pant size!!  Not to mention ladies, I am premenopausal and it keeps my mood stable and I don't have night sweats! Maybe my experience is different than most but this product has changed my life and I am more energetic and happy!  I have started to give it to my teen kids!  It took about a week before I started noticing a difference.     The only side effect that I have noticed is a slight burp about 1min after taking it that all I can compare it to is a very mild tuna fish flavor but it went away immediately.   I hope this helps someone. ...you have to be patient .     I didn't see the one I use in the drop down but it is from Vitamin World...it's their brand!

I think I'm going to cut back on the daily dosage to help this problem, but even if it doesn't, the health benefits greatly outweigh the gas I have (maybe my wife wouldn't agree).

I've done PT, chiropractor, massage therapy and of course rest and have lived with pain everyday.  Now virtually none.  I also was surprised I had NO cramps with my period this month.  Last 2 months cramps were worse than my labor pains.  This month, n,ot even a slight cramp. I pray to God they deem this vitamin safe to take FOREVER!!!!

reviews: A knee which has bothered me since removal of a meniscus (5 yr. prior) is now much less painful to walk.  I also note that my vision has improved to the point that I can read words on TV without my glasses.  My lipid studies have been excellent in the past year that I have used Krill oil. I had a very painful stiff neck that was only minimally relieved with Chiropractor and acupuncture treatments--that is now all but gone.

reviews: I took this at the recommendation of a friend, same age, and fellow runner who like me, has mild arthritis and joint pain.  Joint pain and inflammation has subsided along with treatment.  Minor side effects of gas, and occasional loose stool, but minor.  Other side effects include very positive Cholesteral improvements and Triglicerides improvement.  Blood pressure continues to get lower.  I've also lost weight and improved my fitness training, so could be a side product of healthier fitness and, diet.  However, it is working for me, so am giving Krill some credit.

reviews: A friend was taking this on the advice of her orthopedic doctor. A month later she was walking without the aid of her cane with no limping or gait problem. My husband & I decided to try it for knee, joint, and general aches & pains.  Within one month, I have been able to kneel, walk up & down stairs, and work all day with no aches or pains.  No Aleve or Motrin!  My husband is able to turn his usually stiff neck a full 90 degrees & is currently standing on a ladder scraping the house. (He is 72) ,We have had no stomach upsets or any other side effects. Don't understand why it works, but we are happy with the results!
